comprehensive_overview: RSEM (RNA-Seq by Expectation Maximization) is a software package for estimating gene and isoform expression levels from RNA-Seq data. It quantifies the abundances of transcripts by calculating maximum likelihood estimates based on the Expectation-Maximization algorithm.
core_features: Estimation of gene and isoform expression levels from RNA-Seq data
Calculation of transcript abundances using Expectation-Maximization algorithm
Support for various RNA-Seq data formats
Includes programs for building reference indices and performing transcript abundance estimation
